title: Server Lag?
body:
Hi,

Just played a game where my ping was fluctuating from 75-165ms 

Now I ran a speedtest in which showed my ping being 28ms ( I always get 34ms on League)

Really quite confused as to how that's possible, since 2 other people on my team had the same issue but the whole enemy team was fine.

I am with Optus btw.


Anyone else experiencing this or just a select few?
